description: 6. When should someone seek medical care?
title: 6. When should someone seek medical care?
content: If a person has been in an area or country that has the Ebola Virus Disease or in contact with a person known or suspected to have Ebola and they begin to have symptoms, they should seek medical attention immediately. Any cases of persons who are suspected to have the disease should be reported to the nearest health center without delay. Prompt medical care is essential to improve the rate of survival from the disease by the patients.
